content.text:
HON. RUBEN GALLEGO

                               of arizona

                    in the house of representatives

                        Friday, November 3, 2017
content.speaker: None

content.text:
Mr. GALLEGO. Mr. Speaker, earlier this week, I cast a vote in error. 
On the Roll Call Vote No. 598, I had intended to vote in the following 
manner: Roll Call Vote No. 598--Resilient Federal Forests Act of 2017--
No.
content.speaker: Mr. GALLEGO
